name: Reversteroids (bamhm182)
description: As my very first entry into any sort of Ludum Dare, I wanted to make a game similar to Asteroids, but in which you are the asteroid. I picked up GameMaker: Studios around two weeks ago and haven't programmed in ages, so try not to judge too harshly. ;) At the same time, I welcome all criticism and challenges to make the game better. Hope you enjoy!
